titleStmt.title: An exposicyon vpon a pece of saint James epistle to the ende of ye second chapitre, begynnynge at D.in ye same chapitre: as hereafter foloweth

publicationStmt.publisher: in fletestrete, at ye signe of the sonne, by me Johan Byddell,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: fletestrete, at ye signe of the sonne
